content.prompt_es:
Fill in the gaps with the correct form of the word provided in parentheses.

Base words: (1) SOCIETY, (2) PROBLEM, (3) SOLVE, (4) COHESIVE, (5) ISSUE
content.main_text: In modern (1)___, many people face various social (2)___. Governments often work towards finding (3)___ to these issues, promoting (4)___ within communities. It is important to raise awareness about social (5)___ and work together for positive change.

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'wish':
content.explanation: En esta frase, expresamos un arrepentimiento por no haber estudiado más, usando 'wish' para referirnos a algo en el pasado que deseamos que fuera diferente.
content.stimulus_en:
I regret not studying harder for the exam.

I wish I had studied harder for the exam. ...
content.correct_answer: I wish I had studied harder for the exam.

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'regret':
content.explanation: Aquí expresamos el arrepentimiento por no haber aceptado una oferta de trabajo, utilizando 'regret' para enfatizar el sentimiento.
content.stimulus_en:
If only I had taken that job offer last year.

I regret not taking that job offer last year. ...
content.correct_answer: I regret not taking that job offer last year.

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'wish':
content.explanation: En este caso, estamos utilizando 'wish' para expresar un deseo sobre habilidades actuales, específicamente, un deseo sobre la fluidez en el idioma.
content.stimulus_en:
I wish I could speak French fluently.

I wish I were able to speak French fluently. ...
content.correct_answer: I wish I were able to speak French fluently.

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'regret':
content.explanation: Usamos 'regret' nuevamente para expresar el arrepentimiento por una decisión de inversión que no se tomó en el pasado.
content.stimulus_en:
If only I had invested in that project earlier.

I regret not investing in that project earlier. ...
content.correct_answer: I regret not investing in that project earlier.

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'wish':
content.explanation: En esta oración, usamos 'wish' para indicar que deseamos que la planificación de la presentación hubiera sido mejor.
content.stimulus_en:
I wish we had planned the presentation better.

I wish we had made better plans for the presentation. ...
content.correct_answer: I wish we had made better plans for the presentation.
